title: Godot Engine Official
description: Godot is a 2D and 3D free and open source game engine developed by a community of contributors. It provides a huge set of common tools, so you can just focus on making your game without reinventing the wheel.

items.title: Godot Showcase - Somar
items.description: We interviewed Frederic Plourde from Collabora and Daniel Castellanos from Decasis about the Somar project.
items.dc:creator: Bastiaan Olij

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.5 dev 3
items.description: Access the engine like never before!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.5 dev 2
items.description: This is where the fun begins
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Godot XR update - March 2025
items.description: Godot XR Community Game Jam February 2025
items.dc:creator: Bastiaan Olij

items.title: Maintenance release: Godot 4.4.1
items.description: Godot 4.4 was a massive success, and with most users migrating to it, we discovered and fixed a number of significant bugs which warrant a first maintenance release.
items.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

items.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.4.1 RC 2
items.description: Closing in on the first maintenance release for Godot 4.4, fixing a number of regressions and other significant bugs found in this month's feature release.
items.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.5 dev 1
items.description: The feature freeze has melted away—here comes the flood!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.4.1 RC 1
items.description: Godot 4.4 was released 10 days ago, and as is customary with such major feature updates, we have a late harvest of regression fixes to offer!
items.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

items.title: Godot XR update - February 2025
items.description: New plugin releases for Godot XR.
items.dc:creator: Bastiaan Olij

items.title: Godot 4.4, a unified experience
items.description: Look forward to plenty of quality of life improvements hidden within this release. Faster load speeds, reduced stutter, streamlined processes — spotting all the optimizations that have been applied in the background will take some time.
items.dc:creator: Godot contributors

items.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.4 RC 3
items.description: We said "final" for the previous release candidate, but good things come in threes, don't they?
items.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

items.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.4 RC 2
items.description: With a stable release imminent, join us for one final round of testing.
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Godot Showcase - Museum of All Things
items.description: What if Wikipedia was a place you could visit? That’s the idea behind The Museum of All Things, a free and open-source procedurally-generated museum built on Wikipedia’s vast knowledge base.
items.dc:creator: Emi

items.title: Release candidate: Godot 4.4 RC 1
items.description: Godot 4.4 is now practically ready for its stable release, so it's time for the last round(s) of testing to make sure it's a smooth upgrade for all users.
items.dc:creator: Rémi Verschelde

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.4 beta 4
items.description: The 4.4 beta phase nears its end!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.4 beta 3
items.description: Picking up the pace!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.4 beta 2
items.description: The bugs don't stand a chance!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: 2024 Cherry-picks
items.description: Over the course of 2024, the Godot project has amassed more new features and community highlights than any one person can keep track of. To ensure you did not miss anything essential, we have selected a few memorable moments and key updates to revisit together.
items.dc:creator: Nat

items.title: Our first GodotCon in the US - Save the date!
items.description: Want to join? Boston 5th - 7th of May. Call for speakers and sponsors open!
items.dc:creator: Emi

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.4 beta 1
items.description: Godot 4.4 is on its way! Please lend a hand by testing this beta release and reporting your findings.
items.dc:creator: Godot contributors

items.title: UID changes coming to Godot 4.4
items.description: Godot's resource UID system is changing to better support scripts and shaders. Read on to know what's required on your part to fully benefit from it.
items.dc:creator: Hugo Locurcio

items.title: Godot C# packages move to .NET 8
items.description: On moving to the latest .NET LTS release, and what it means for users.
items.dc:creator: Raul Santos

items.title: Dev snapshot: Godot 4.4 dev 7
items.description: One last build before the holidays!
items.dc:creator: Thaddeus Crews

items.title: Godot XR community - December 2024
items.description: Interesting projects from the Godot XR community.
items.dc:creator: Bastiaan Olij
